I watch these 2 movies every Christmas.  I wish everyone did.  It sends a message of hope, love and kindness.  A MUST read!

The story was meaningful and sad but wise  solutions were found for the problem; the actors played their roles well.
Love both movies.  Heartfelt and brings you joy.  Brings tears to your eyes but in a good way.  Can watch it over again each year! Hugh Thompson was a classmate of mine.
Both are wonderful Christmas Family movies. It is a sad story but has great message and very good actors. The ending is a very happy surprise.
I've been looking for this movie for a long time,i've just about given up and there it was,one of my favorite movie to watch anytime of the year. it always bring tears to my eyes. I love it.
This is a beautiful love story of happiness and grief, then happiness again. Everyone will enjoy it, just watch and cry and smile.
They are some Real great family movies.  My wife loved them all.  I have no regrets on the purchase of those movies  and other bought at the same time.

The Christmas Shoes is my favorite Christmas movie!! They used to show this every year but last year they didn't and I was really upset. I am not a big Rob Lowe fan but you end up liking him in the end. Kimberly Williams is adorable and her son in the movie is sweet and loving. This has become a family tradition for my family. I am excited to have my own copy I can watch year round.
This is a wonderful family movie for Christmas.  Shares on what we can do to help others and to not think of ourselves but of those that are in need.
Both movies are really sad and make up feel for the little boy who is a man in the second movie.  I cried my eyes off in the first movie.
A friend recommended Christmas Shoes. I loaned the DVD back to them as they had no idea that the Christmas Blessing was a sequel.we all enjoyed them very much
I wasn't expecting it so fast.. very happy with it and will recommend and order again. I love those movies!

I enjoyed both these movies.. so nice to be able to watch wholesome movies... I didn't have to worry about words that shouldnt be spoken or scenes i would have to fast forward... they were inspiring..  People helping others.. The way we should be doing.. Sad parts but that is part of life..
This dvd was suppose to be 2 movies on one dvd, but only had only 1 movie on it and did not work. I want my money back! It was a Christmas gift to my mother, how embarrassing.
These two movies are wonderful!!  I received the double DVD in no time at all.  I would buy from them again.

Love, Love, Love these 2 movies.  These are some of the best movies I've ever watched.  I cry everytime I watch them, especially Christmas Shoes.  I can't help but cry.  I will always love the movie.  Be sure and have a box of tissues handy!

Wonderful movies, I think viewer would enjoy anytime during the year, but obviously Nov/Dec certainly would help you add to the Christmas season. When I ordered, was advised it might take up to seven days...rec'd a email a day later advising product was sent that day! Sure enough 2 days later got it---Free Shipping great service, great deal! Thanks A

Read the book "The Christmas Shoes" years ago and thoroughly enjoyed the story.  When the story was turned into a movie I was quite skeptical.  Often times I have found that true justice is not done to the writer's creation.  Thoroughly happy that I took a chance on this movie.  The plot was true to the basic story and the movie "played" with authenticity.  Thanks, this movie is a keeper.
great combination of story and heartfelt reminders of the important things in life, especially around the Christmas time, but great to watch any time of the year.

Very uplifiting movies.  They reveal the true meaning of life and Christmas.  You must watch these movies.  Personally, I think you could watch them any time of the year and be inspired and motivated.
These 2 movies were very inspiring. I really like having them on one dvd because it takes less space to store. Would definitely recommend these classics.
Very happy with the purchase and the time that it took to arrive. We are very satisfied. thanks
